java/liquibase/util/MD5Util.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import java.security.MessageDigest;
00004 import java.security.DigestInputStream;
00005 import java.io.InputStream;
00006 import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
00007 
00011 public class MD5Util {
00012     public static String computeMD5(String input) {
00013         MessageDigest digest;
00014         try {
00015             digest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
00016             digest.update(input.getBytes("UTF-8"));
00017         } catch (Exception e) {
00018             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00019         }
00020         byte[] digestBytes = digest.digest();
00021 
00022         StringBuffer hexString = new StringBuffer();
00023         for (byte digestByte : digestBytes) {
00024             hexString.append(Integer.toHexString(0xFF & digestByte));
00025         }
00026         return hexString.toString();
00027 
00028     }
00029 
00030     public static String computeMD5(InputStream stream) {
00031         MessageDigest digest;
00032         try {
00033             digest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
00034 
00035             DigestInputStream digestStream = new DigestInputStream(stream, digest);
00036             while (digestStream.read() != -1) {
00037                 ; //digest is updating
00038             }
00039         } catch (Exception e) {
00040             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00041         }
00042         byte[] digestBytes = digest.digest();
00043 
00044         StringBuffer hexString = new StringBuffer();
00045         for (byte digestByte : digestBytes) {
00046             hexString.append(Integer.toHexString(0xFF & digestByte));
00047         }
00048         return hexString.toString();
00049     }
00050 }
